PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07392019-06-06,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of BRUNO MARCHAND of Québec, Quebec, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
AttachmentsAttachment
